adjectives.description: stereoscopic (comparative more stereoscopic, superlative most stereoscopic)

entries.meaning: Of or relating to stereoscopy; three-dimensional.
examples: It is remarkable because its three-dimensional world is even more stereoscopic than the real world.

entries.meaning: Of or relating to the stereoscope.
Designed to be used by both eyes simultaneously, or obtained by imaging from two viewpoints simultaneously.
